reviews.customers_say: Customers find the dress chic, well-made, and comfortable, with good quality fabric that's soft and flowy.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice Dress, Comfortable and Looks Great
items.body: Pretty dress, and very comfortable (I am wearing it as I write this). It fits true to size, and doesn’t really require ironing. It washes well in the washing machine, and does well in the dryer (I use the delicates setting). I highly recommend this dress. The color is beautiful. Read more
items.author: Deidre Kellogg Ketroser

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars This is a great dress
items.body: I really like this dress. I tried it on w boots as well as w heals. And loved both looks. Casual to dressy w ease. It has a loose( not too loose) but very flattering shape. Nice fabric. I would recommend this dress for women of all shapes and sizes. Read more
items.author: Mrs.JDG

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Casual or Dressy
items.body: This is a cute dress and can be worn for most any occasion depending on the shoes boots or jewelry you are wearing. The material is light but not transparent. I think this dress is perfect for ages 25 through 50. I am 70 and petite but it was too short on me. One thing to watch for, the sleeves were sewn incorrectly at the shoulder. One sleeve puffed up, the other did not. Overall it is an affordable option for any occasion. My husband however thought it looked like a graduation gown. I can see his point but it’s still cute. Read more
items.author: DJ Nuch

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Sizes run very small
items.body: The dress is beautiful and great quality but it is NOT true to size. It runs very small. It says 2X/20 and I couldn’t get it over my head. My son’s girlfriend tried it on- she is normally a 9 and it fit her perfectly. It is made in China so my guess is they do not understand US sizes. It probably also doesn’t help that the material has no “give”. It’s cute- looks great on her, but keep in mind a XXL fits more like a medium Read more
items.author: VickyD

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Would buy again
items.body: The green color is a little lighter than pictured, but still nice. This is a very comfortable dress. Not too tight or loose. Definitely wrinkle resistant. The length is good as well. The cut is good. I would purchase again in another color. Read more
items.author: Customer

items.title: 1.0 out of 5 stars CHEAP
items.body: This is the cheapest dress I have seen in a very long time. the fabric is unacceptable and the overall quality of the dress is just deplorable. Read more
items.author: Customer

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very comfortable and classy
items.body: I ordered the olive green color and it's exactly as pictured. The dress is very comfortable. I wore it to a wedding in August. It's light and airy but fully lined so no slip is needed underneath. The cut is classy. Very versatile. I wouldn't hesitate to order it. Not a bad price for the quality. Read more
items.author: Mama H

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Material flow perfect
items.body: Love this dress material & fit & color Read more
items.author: Sissy

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress V Neck Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

The design is easy to style with simple accessories and works well in photos thanks to clean lines and a balanced silhouette.

The design is easy to style with simple accessories and works well in photos thanks to clean lines and a balanced silhouette.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress V Neck Long Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: A-black, A1-dark Green, A1-red, A-green, A1-klein Blue, B-white Flower Navy, A12-black Flowers, A1-purple, A-indigo, B-orange Floral, A-blue, A-moss Green, A-wine Red. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
